name: Horizon Sports Properties, Inc.
description: Horizon Sports Properties, Inc. is a leading sports and entertainment marketing agency that specializes in creating unparalleled experiences for fans and brands. Founded in 2010, the company has established itself as a premier partner for various sports teams, leagues, and organizations, focusing on enhancing brand visibility and fan engagement through innovative marketing strategies. Horizon Sports Properties offers a wide range of services, including sponsorship sales, event management, and digital marketing solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of its clients. The company is known for its collaborative approach, working closely with teams and brands to develop customized programs that drive revenue and elevate the fan experience. With a team of experienced professionals from diverse backgrounds in sports marketing, event planning, and digital media, Horizon Sports Properties is well-equipped to navigate the ever-changing landscape of the sports industry. The company is committed to leveraging technology and data analytics to optimize marketing efforts and deliver measurable results. As a trusted partner to numerous high-profile sports organizations, Horizon Sports Properties continues to innovate and expand its offerings, solidifying its position as a leader in the sports marketing space.

seo.meta_title: Horizon Sports Properties, Inc. | Leading Sports Marketing Agency
seo.meta_description: Discover Horizon Sports Properties, Inc., a premier sports marketing agency specializing in sponsorship sales, event management, and digital marketing solutions.

faq.question: What services does Horizon Sports Properties offer?
faq.answer: Horizon Sports Properties offers sponsorship sales, event management, and digital marketing solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Horizon Sports Properties?
faq.answer: Jessica Lee is the CEO of Horizon Sports Properties, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Horizon Sports Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: Horizon Sports Properties is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: When was Horizon Sports Properties founded?
faq.answer: Horizon Sports Properties was founded in 2010.
